data: For practice guidelines, refer to Decision Support Tool (DST): Treatment of Hypoxemia
Increase frequency of fetal health monitoring

Indications: 
- SpO2 less than 94% 
- Acute Condition(s) (e.g., hemorrhage, pulmonary embolism)
- Severe Trauma
- Short-term therapy or surgical intervention
Initiate the minimal amount of oxygen necessary to reverse signs / symptoms of hypoxia or correct fetal disstress
Routine, Titrate O2 to keep SpO2 94% or greater, nasal Cannula. NIA for Treatment of Hypoxemia
Routine, Titrate O2 to keep SpO2 94% or greater, Simple Mask. NIA for Treatment of Hypoxemia
When oxygen therapy is initiated to establish ongoing oxygen therapy and management
